products.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
products.discript: Harry Potter (Daniel Radcliffe) is well aware that he is no match for Voldemort, especially now he has the Elder Wand.

products.name: Harry Potter and the Cursed Child
products.discript: Let's be honest here, we as a sub aren't exactly nice to The Cursed Child, and arguably with good reason.
